name:
Goosebumps: The Game
Update Ver. 1.01
description: This is an update for Goosebumps: The Game. This download does not contain the full version of the title. In order to use this update, you must have the full version of Goosebumps: The Game.
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
